Introducing Autm-rb: A Bootstrap-Based Jekyll Theme

29 Sep 2014 | Autm-rb, download

Introduction

Autm-rb is a simple and beautiful Jekyll theme. Partly based on “shiori” and “midnight” themes. Now It looks really cool.

Features

Autm-rb can be used for both portfolio and blogging.

  • github, stackoverflow, twitter links
  • sharebuttons: twitter, facebook, google plus
  • comments via DISQUS
  • pagination
  • tags
  • codehighlighting
  • bootstrap components
  • font awesome
  • responsive
  • embeded video support
  • cool colors

View on GitHub
